title: Ion Maiden Preview Campaign Speedrun - 100% 19:15 RTA/19:00 IGT
description: After finding all the secrets I wanted to try to do a 100% run. I think when the full game comes out it's going to be really fun to run 100% since killing stuff is so satisfying in this game. Plus, after doing Duke3D Max% I'm excited do that again in another game.
